title: Repatching Problem PLEEEEASE
body: I'm sure many of you guys out there share this problem with me-- almost every other time I start League, the login screen prompts me to repatch something, because an "older version" of the game has been recognized.  This has been happening ever since {{champion:6}}  was released anew.   Worse, the game will sometimes even need to re-download.  Is there a fix for this, or is this just how the new client will behave from here on out?

replies.body:
The client definitely isn't meant to be re-downloading those patches every time, but it sounds like some of those patch files are somehow getting corrupted or damaged. That repatching is the client's way of trying to prevent you from crashing over and over again, which may very well happen if we don't get those files working properly again. 

If those patches still aren't applying correctly, let's try a different approach. Grab our [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and run a **force repatch**. That should be the last time you'll need to do that, but definitely hit me back up if it keeps happening!
